elements.text: You have been at the doctor's office all morning. It has been hours since you ate anything, and you're starting to get a little shaky from low blood sugar. The nurse walks up and gives you a pitying look. You worry that she assumes your movements are related to...

elements.name: Long Day at the Doctor_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
